column5: Just thought I’d share a few photos of the past few weekend outings up in the Haliburton region.  Got into some nice Splake on early ice :      And got a nice 22 incher and some Lakers that were all in the slot : I know just disregard the Leaf attire … LOL    Tight lines … cheers

Very well done. Looks like a picture postcard day. I hope your better half dressed you for your outing, my goodness sakes, the Muple Lups? as my father says. Haven't seen a Splake for 30 years, and a nice bonus eye to boot.
Another flasher user. Man how do you guys read those things?  Nice splake.
way to go, Julian!!! awesome fish...what's next??
Nice. I think I went hunting for the last time untill spring today. Ice for me as soon as this rain is over.
Another flasher user. Man how do you guys read those things?  Nice splake. Same way someone reads Morse code.

Thanks folks ... can't leave the flasher at home now .. just what you get used to I guess, sure has helped me put more fish on the ice compared to fishing without !  What's next ? Laker opener in Temagami for sure !
nice!  I have yet to catch a Splake. One of these days... Then again, I have only fished for them once......  Cheers!
Niiiiice fish.  I love how dark the splake can get in those stained water lakes.
great colors on those splake.  Good luck on Temag!!

Thanks folks ... can't leave the flasher at home now .. just what you get used to I guess, sure has helped me put more fish on the ice compared to fishing without !  What's next ? Laker opener in Temagami for sure ! sweet!!! have a great time there and bring us a nice report
Yep... could have been a great report... until that sweater. lol.  Joking!  Like those splakers.  My nemesis.  Good on ya!
